fields.name: iTOW
fields.description: GPS time of week of the navigation epoch. See section iTOW timestamps in the integration manual for details.

fields.name: version
fields.description: Message version (0x01 for this version)

fields.name: reserved0
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: gpsNmiFlags
fields.description: GPS navigation message cross-check information flags.

fields.name: wnoCheckedGPS
fields.description: 1 = week number check performed.

fields.name: wnoInvalidGPS
fields.description: 1 = week number invalid.

fields.name: UTCOREfCheckedGPS
fields.description: 1 = GPS UTCO reference time check performed.

fields.name: UTCOREfInvalidGPS
fields.description: 1 = GPS UTCO reference time invalid.

fields.name: gpsLsFlags
fields.description: GPS leap second cross-check information flags.

fields.name: 1sValGPS
fields.description: 1 = Leap second value out of range.

fields.name: dnRangeGPS
fields.description: 1 = Day number value out of range.

fields.name: totRangeGPS
fields.description: 1 = Data reference TOW out of range.

fields.name: 1sEventGPS
fields.description: 1 = Unexpected leap second event.

fields.name: recNowGPS
fields.description: 1 = Data received this epoch.

fields.name: galNmiFlags
fields.description: Galileo navigation message cross-check information flags.

fields.name: wnoCheckedGAL
fields.description: 1 = week number check performed.

fields.name: wnoInvalidGAL
fields.description: 1 = week number invalid.

fields.name: galLsFlags
fields.description: Galileo leap second cross-check information flags.

fields.name: 1sValGAL
fields.description: 1 = Leap second value out of range.

fields.name: bdsNmiFlags
fields.description: BeiDou navigation message cross-check information flags.

fields.name: wnoCheckedBDS
fields.description: 1 = week number check performed.

fields.name: wnoInvalidBDS
fields.description: 1 = week number invalid.

fields.name: bdsLsFlags
fields.description: BeiDou leap second cross-check information flags.

fields.name: 1sValBDS
fields.description: 1 = Leap second value out of range.

fields.name: dnRangeBDS
fields.description: 1 = Day number value out of range.

fields.name: totRangeBDS
fields.description: 1 = Data reference TOW out of range.

fields.name: 1sEventBDS
fields.description: 1 = Unexpected leap second event.

fields.name: recNowBDS
fields.description: 1 = Data received this epoch.

fields.name: gloNmiFlags
fields.description: GLONASS navigation message cross-check information flags.

fields.name: wnoCheckedGLO
fields.description: 1 = week number check performed.

fields.name: wnoInvalidGLO
fields.description: 1 = week number invalid.
